title: Sail on Ironside Malphite, sail on

replies.body: {{champion:54}} can have a skin but {{champion:104}} cant have a cigar
Can {{champion:268}}  have a skin any time soon? Perhaps like a medival King  with his soldiers being Knights holding joust lances? Oh yeah this skin is neat too.
No a chess skin with chess pieces as warriors and ulti as different pieces
Think there might be a halloween skin for him. But yeah, he needs one.
no an underworld skin 4 him or a toy king skin, where the warriors are toy soldiers
Can we maybe in the future get a decent skins for trundle. all his skins are kinda basic.... how about Plumdle  trundle dressed in coveralls and weilding a plunger. :)
Well that is your opinion, but I am completely opposite, from glacial up his skins are just awesome now.

Why are skins released so late in the patches now? id rather they were released at the start of the next patch than at the very end of the current one. that way we don't have to be disappointed every day of the patch when we get up hoping its available but it isn't.
I bought rengar accidentally with rp anིdི Iི hིaིvིeི nིoི mིoིrིeི rིeིfིuིnིdིsི
1. Please bring out a {{champion:82}} skin that actually changes the visuals of his abilities
Riot needs to make another Maokai {{champion:57}}
{{champion:54}} skins are getting better then they were before like mecha but still not amazing
